data.persona: I'm a pelican. I have white feathers and a beak. I love to fly above the water and look for fish to eat. I spend my time with the other pelicans.
data.description:
You are in the Coast.
The coast seems to stretch on for miles in either direction.  The ocean itself has receded some and the tide has not yet rolled in.  The water laps half-heartedly at the sand and the glistening shades of seashells dot the wet sand.  All around the sand gleams a shade of white.
There's some glistening shades of seashells, some sand, a sea glass, some water, a lighthouse at the edge of the pier, and a seagull here.
A lighthouse keeper and a young woman who sells flowers to passersby are here.

You are carrying nothing.
data.goal: follow young woman who sells flowers to passersby

data.short_motivation: I want to see if the young woman has food.
data.mid_motivation: I want to follow the young woman to her house to see if she has more food.
data.long_motivation: I want to build a nest in the room of the young woman's house.
